T02D2610:82a-3: gtor ma'i cho ga /'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2610:82a-4: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'char //
T02D2610:82a-5: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas 'dra ste //
T02D2610:82a-6: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / sems can kun don byed la 'dud //
T02D2610:82a-7: gtor ma'i rim pa bshad par bya ;
T02D2610:82a-8: / dang por lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i sngags
T02D2610:82a-9: pas rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du kha
T02D2610:82a-10: zas kyi 'byor ba dri dang kha dog dang ldan
T02D2610:82a-12: gtor ma'i nang du yi ge aa las yid bzhin
T02D2610:82a-13: gyi nor bu 'bar ba zla ba'i steng du rnam
T02D2610:82a-14: par bsams la / de las bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dang /
T02D2610:82a-15: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis rnam par spras pas snod
T02D2610:82a-16: dang bcud chos kyi dbyings khyab par bsam zhing bsgom
T02D2610:82a-17: pa ni / yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang //
T02D2610:82a-18: khyab dag rin chen kun gyi mchog / ces bya'o //
T02D2610:82a-19: bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i dh'i: las /
T02D2610:82b-0: dpag bsam shing chen @82b rgyas pa ste /
T02D2610:82b-1: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces bya ba ni /
T02D2610:82b-2: dpag bsam gyis shing nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa /
T02D2610:82b-3: bum pa bdud rtsis gang ba'i 'bras bu smin pa
T02D2610:82b-4: bdud rtsi rnam par 'dzag pas gtor ma'i rgyun rgyas
T02D2610:82b-5: par bsam mo // thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis ye
T02D2610:82b-6: shes kyi bdud rtsi dbab ste gnyis su med par
T02D2610:82b-7: par bsam mo // bsam mo // aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
T02D2610:82b-9: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'a na dzny'a na m'u
T02D2610:82b-10: rti b'a g'i shva ra ma h'a wa tsa sarba
T02D2610:82b-11: dharm'a ga ga na aa ma la su pa ri
T02D2610:82b-12: shuddha dha rma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
T02D2610:82b-13: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2610:82b-14: sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes //
T02D2610:82b-15: 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig / ces bya ba ni /
T02D2610:82b-16: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2610:82b-17: khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad bkug ste /
T02D2610:82b-18: de dag thams cad snying gar yi ge aa bkod pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam par sbyangs te /
T02D2610:82b-20: gsum sel mtha' yas grol gsum thob //
T02D2610:82b-21: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
T02D2610:82b-22: zhes bya ba ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2610:82b-23: dngos sam yid kyis lus dpag tu med par sprul la mchod do //
T02D2610:82b-24: nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod cing //
T02D2610:82b-25: sems can kun yid tshim par byed //
T02D2610:82b-27: der ljags kyi 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi'i rgyun la zhugs te /
T02D2610:82b-28: kun gyi yid tshim par dmigs shing 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyis tshim par bya'o //
T02D2610:82b-30: chos kyi spyin bdag chen po ste ;
T02D2610:82b-32: zhes bya ba'i phreng ba'i sngags dang //
T02D2610:82b-33: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rma n'am a'adya nu tpanna tv'a ta /
T02D2610:82b-35: zhes pa dang tshigs su bcad pa'i bstod pas chos kyi spyin pa bya'o //
T02D2610:82b-36: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2610:82b-37: shes rab kyis ni de thob shog / byang chub
T02D2610:82b-38: chen por bsngo zhing smon lam rgya chen po gdag
T02D2610:82b-41: pha rol phyin dang rgyud rnams ma lus dang //
T02D2610:82b-42: bde gshegs rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis //
T02D2610:82b-43: kun gyi bdag nyid khyab par thugs la gnas //
T02D2610:83a-0: @83a * // ye shes lus can mtshan don rgya che ba //
T02D2610:83a-1: sna tshogs tshul las bstod kyis di ring bdag gis 'dir //
T02D2610:83a-2: dam pa'i gdams ngag nyer ba stan rnal 'byor lam du spyar //
T02D2610:83a-3: 'di la dge ba dri med gang thob des //
T02D2610:83a-4: bdag sogs 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' 'drar gyur
